SalviumPrivacy-First Blockchain Protocol

Secure, scalable, and compliant privacy solutions for the future of finance

Get Started
View on GitHub
🔒

Privacy by Design

Built from the ground up with privacy as a core feature, utilizing advanced cryptographic techniques like ring signatures and zero-knowledge proofs.

⚡

High Performance

Asynchronous transaction processing and optimized block validation ensure fast and efficient operations.

🛡️

Regulatory Compliance

Optional transparency features and built-in compliance tools make Salvium suitable for institutional adoption.

📝

Smart Contracts

Privacy-preserving smart contracts enable complex financial applications while maintaining confidentiality.

📈

Scalable Architecture

Designed to handle high transaction volumes with dynamic block sizes and efficient network protocols.

🔐

Battle-tested Security

Thoroughly audited codebase with multiple security layers and continuous monitoring.

Latest Updates

🎉 Salvium v1.0.0 is now live! Check out our release notes for details.

Why Salvium? ​

Core Features

Salvium combines the best of both worlds - uncompromising privacy and regulatory compliance. Our protocol enables:

  • Financial Privacy: Protect your transactions and balances
  • Smart Contracts: Build privacy-preserving DApps
  • Institutional Support: Optional transparency for regulated entities
  • High Performance: Fast and efficient transactions
  • Developer Friendly: Comprehensive tools and documentation
  • Community Driven: Open source and community governed
